name: Puzzle Harbor
description:
Description:
Sokoban meets Tetris in the stevedore daily life. Push crates around and organize then by type in lines of three or more to send then away. You must clean the entire stage before proceeding. Made for the GBAJAM 2 in 2013.

Controls:
[keyboard] Arrows to move, Spacebar to push, Esc to reset stage;
[joystick, Xbox as reference] 'D-pad' to move, 'A' to push, 'Back' to reset stage.
ALT+ENTER to fullscreen;

Engine: Game Maker Studio
